title: Looking for a professional team for season 6
body: Im looking for a team for season 6. I am a mid main but i can play anywhere but not support. I am gold 5 and have amazing kds on most of the champions i play

replies.body: I main {{champion:27}} Support and pretty good at it. Add me if you want

You for real?

Edit: Genuinely curious, surely ksing would prohibit actual supporting

Yep Played Singed support for 4 years now and have over 360k xp with him (would be 600K+ but due the special players im put with its less :( ). Most of the time i do you could say KS but that's because I do most of the damage myself and trust me 90% of the time my new never does well. So no point getting a feeder fed :). However if the team is not stupid then i'll happily support like a normal support :). Feel free to check me out
Thats pretty much what every game looks like ;/
Oh yea of course not for everyone :), just me....

Why can't bronze people admit there play is why they are where they are... Its not elo hell, its you man.

The only reason I can think of for being lower then you should be is you haven't reached your peak yet (but you are winning consistently).

Yes thats because im too good for bronze :), most games are an easy win if my team isnt mentally challenged. But when i go to play ranked....im not sure how the people i get paired with even manage to open league. And thats the real reason i cant get out of bronze, and im also on the 12ives who go afk/ troll i they miss out on a single CS -_-

That's also a top singed...

Edit: Unless that game ended before 20 mins, there is no way everyone's CS is that low

The game went on for just under 40 minutes, trust be im in elo hell :0. I see Xin sho's with Runaan's Hurricane. I did think of playing top but there is no point if you have 2 feeders bot lane so its worth the time to play bot lane and make sure is 1 less feeder if any at all.

KDs aren't everything... You need to concede kills sometimes to allow your whole team to be strong... I know where your coming from with the I must get kills to carry deal :)
Anyways I'm also G5 I main mid lane assassins (and Azir) and top lane. If your interested in sharing the mid and top position and be a team player I'll throw my hat in

Edit: if you play mages mid we can do the ill take it if assassins are better you take it if mages are good? Idk we can discuss later
